mapper.insert: insert into b_data_source( name, data_type, data_json, date_user, date_passwd, date_url, date_servers, date_topics, creater, create_time, state, iscancel, remark ) values ( #{name}, #{dataType}, #{dataJson}, #{dateUser}, #{datePasswd}, #{dateUrl}, #{dateServers}, #{dateTopics}, #{creater}, #{createTime}, #{state}, #{iscancel}, #{remark} )
mapper.update: update b_data_source set name = #{dataSource.name}, data_type = #{dataSource.dataType}, data_json = #{dataSource.dataJson}, date_user = #{dataSource.dateUser}, date_passwd = #{dataSource.datePasswd}, date_url = #{dataSource.dateUrl}, date_servers = #{dataSource.dateServers}, date_topics = #{dataSource.dateTopics}, creater = #{dataSource.creater}, create_time = #{dataSource.createTime}, state = #{dataSource.state}, iscancel = #{dataSource.iscancel}, remark = #{dataSource.remark} where id = #{id}
update b_data_source SET iscancel = 1 where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select id, name, data_type AS dataType, data_json AS dataJson, date_user AS dateUser, date_passwd AS datePasswd, date_url AS dateUrl, date_servers AS dateServers, date_topics AS dateTopics, creater, create_time AS createTime, state, iscancel, remark from b_data_source where id = #{id}
select count(id) from b_data_source where iscancel = 0
mapper.insert:
insert into b_data_source
name,
data_type,
data_json,
date_user,
date_passwd,
date_url,
date_servers,
date_topics,
creater,
create_time,
state,
iscancel,
remark,
#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{dataType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{dataJson,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{dateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{datePasswd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{dateUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{dateServers,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{dateTopics,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{creater,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{state,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{iscancel,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.update:
update b_data_source
name = #{dataSource.name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
data_type = #{dataSource.dataType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
data_json = #{dataSource.dataJson,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
date_user = #{dataSource.dateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
date_passwd = #{dataSource.datePasswd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
date_url = #{dataSource.dateUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
date_servers = #{dataSource.dateServers,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
date_topics = #{dataSource.dateTopics,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
creater = #{dataSource.creater,jdbcType=BIGINT},
create_time = #{dataSource.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
state = #{dataSource.state,jdbcType=INTEGER},
iscancel = #{dataSource.iscancel,jdbcType=INGETER},
remark = #{dataSource.remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
